author: rwhitcomb
msg: PIVOT-966: Add code in TextPaneDemo to set the display scale on startup
using a "--scale=n" property.  For instance, using "--scale=2.0" will
set double scale on the whole application.
This is a merge of revision 1678251 from "trunk" to "branches/2.0.x".

author: rwhitcomb
msg: PIVOT-966: Add code in TextPaneDemo to set the display scale on startup
using a "--scale=n" property.  For instance, using "--scale=2.0" will
set double scale on the whole application.
